long_description:
The number of points in the x axis is defined by x_length and length_type
parameters. A length_type of pixels and a x_length of 5000 will result in
a trace with 5000 points. A length_type of nanoseconds instead results in
a trace with a length of defined by the number of (nano)seconds.

Requires a CONNECTION_MDO3XXX node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible Tektronix scopes (untested):
MDO4xxx, MSO4xxx, and DPO4xxx.
short_description: The EXTRACT_TRACE_MDO3XXX node extracts the trace from an MDO3xxx oscilloscope.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MDO3XXX node).

parameters.name: x_length
parameters.description: The length of the trace to extract.

parameters.name: length_type
parameters.description: The units of the length specified in x_length: nanoseconds or pixels.

returns.description: OrderedPair: The trace of the oscilloscope is returned.
